department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Simultaneous Interpretation services, including virtual and in-person interpretation at the Toronto Campus.

### Request Details

* Service: Simultaneous Interpretation services (English to French and French to English)
* Location: Toronto Campus
* Desired Submitting Party: The Canadian Government is seeking offers from bidders to provide these services.

### Bid Submission Details

* Tender Description: The Canadian Government seeks offers for simultaneous interpretation services on an ‘as and when requested’ basis.
* Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria: Must be clearly demonstrated in the submission.
* Tender Closing Time: 14:00 EDT on September 1, 2023.
* Submissions received after the closing time may be rendered non-responsive.
